languages.text: {n}Немигающие глаза Иеронимуса Скорбного впиваются в Ирлиэт.{/n} "Неведомо мне, отчего гласу Его, призванному защищать границы {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} от вторжения врагов Человечества, понадобился в свите богопротивный {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксенос{/g}. Однако покайся, {mf|сыне|дщерь}, и моли Императора о прощении, ибо душа твоя навсегда запятнана скверной чужака. Нет блага в том намерении, что идет супротив воле божьей!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Немигающие глаза Иеронимуса Скорбного впиваются в Ирлэт, стоящую неподалеку.{/n} "Неведомо мне, отчего гласу Его, призванному защищать границы Империума от вторжения врагов Человечества, понадобился в свите богопротивный ксенос. Однако покайся, {mf|сыне|дщерь}, и моли Императора о прощении, ибо душа твоя навсегда запятнана скверной чужака. Нет блага в том намерении, что идет супротив воле божьей!"

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus Doloroso's unblinking eyes fix on Yrliet.{/n} "I know not why His voice, vested to protect the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s borders from the intrusions of the enemies of Humanity, would see fit to keep an ungodly {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} in their retinue. But I say to you: repent, young von Valancius, and pray to the Emperor for forgiveness, for your soul has forevermore been stained with the taint of an outsider. There can be no virtue in that which is contrary to His divine will!"
languages.original_text: {n}Немигающие глаза Иеронимуса Скорбного впиваются в Ирлиэт.{/n} "Неведомо мне, отчего гласу Его, призванному защищать границы {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} от вторжения врагов Человечества, понадобился в свите богопротивный {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксенос{/g}. Однако покайся, {mf|сыне|дщерь}, и моли Императора о прощении, ибо душа твоя навсегда запятнана скверной чужака. Нет блага в том намерении, что идет супротив воле божьей!"

But I say to you: repent, my {mf|son|daughter}, and pray to the Emperor for forgiveness, for your soul has forevermore been stained with the taint of an outsider. There can be no virtue in that which goes against His divine will!"

But I say to you: repent, young von Valancius, and pray to the Emperor for forgiveness, for your soul has forevermore been stained with the taint of an outsider. There can be no virtue in that which is contrary to His divine will!"

languages.text: {n}希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索双眼紧紧地盯着伊莉耶特。{/n}“祂的声音本该保护{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}国境免受人类之敌的入侵。我不明白，为什么一位不敬神的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}会出现在{mf|他|她}的随行人员之中。不过我想告诉你，忏悔吧，年轻的冯·瓦兰修斯，向帝皇祈求宽恕吧，因为你的灵魂已经被外来者彻底玷污了。但凡是违背祂神圣旨意的事情，都毫无美德可言！”
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus Doloroso's unblinking eyes fix on Yrliet.{/n} "I know not why His voice, vested to protect the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s borders from the intrusions of the enemies of Humanity, would see fit to keep an ungodly {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} in their retinue. But I say to you: repent, young von Valancius, and pray to the Emperor for forgiveness, for your soul has forevermore been stained with the taint of an outsider. There can be no virtue in that which is contrary to His divine will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索双眼紧紧地盯着伊莉耶特。{/n}“祂的声音本该保护{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}国境免受人类之敌的入侵，我不明白，为什么一位不敬神的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}会出现在{mf|他|她}的随行人员之中。不过我想告诉你，忏悔吧，我的{mf|孩子|女儿}，向帝皇祈求宽恕吧，因为你的灵魂已经被外来者彻底玷污了。但凡是违背祂神圣旨意的事情，都毫无美德可言！”

languages.text: {n}La mirada inquebrantable de Hieronymus Doloroso recae sobre Yrliet.{/n} «Desconozco por qué un{mf||a} enviad{mf|o|a} del Emperador, investid{mf|o|a} para proteger las fronteras del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} de las intrusiones de los enemigos de la Humanidad, considera oportuno mantener una {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} impía en su séquito. Joven von Valancius, le animo a arrepentirse y rogar el perdón del Emperador, pues su alma ha sido mancillada con la corrupción de una criatura ajena. ¡No puede haber ninguna virtud en un ser contrario a su voluntad divina!».
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus Doloroso's unblinking eyes fix on Yrliet.{/n} "I know not why His voice, vested to protect the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s borders from the intrusions of the enemies of Humanity, would see fit to keep an ungodly {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} in their retinue. But I say to you: repent, young von Valancius, and pray to the Emperor for forgiveness, for your soul has forevermore been stained with the taint of an outsider. There can be no virtue in that which is contrary to His divine will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada inquebrantable de Hieronymus Doloroso recae sobre Yrliet.{/n} «Desconozco por qué Su voz, investida para proteger las fronteras del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} de las intrusiones de los enemigos de la Humanidad, considera oportuno mantener una {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} impía en su séquito. Hij{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}, le animo a arrepentirse y rogar el perdón del Emperador, pues su alma ha sido mancillada con la corrupción de una criatura ajena. ¡No puede haber ninguna virtud en un ser contrario a Su voluntad divina!».

languages.text: {n}ヒエロニムス・ドロローソはまばたきもせず、ユリエットを凝視した。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の国境を人類の敵の侵入から守ることを使命とする皇帝の使いが、なぜ不浄な{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}を従者にするのかはわかりませんが…悔い改めなさい、若きフォン・ヴァランシウスよ。そして皇帝に許しが得られるよう、祈りなさい。あなたの魂は部外者の汚染により、永遠に穢れてしまったのです。皇帝の神聖なる意志に反しては、美徳はありえません！」
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus Doloroso's unblinking eyes fix on Yrliet.{/n} "I know not why His voice, vested to protect the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s borders from the intrusions of the enemies of Humanity, would see fit to keep an ungodly {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} in their retinue. But I say to you: repent, young von Valancius, and pray to the Emperor for forgiveness, for your soul has forevermore been stained with the taint of an outsider. There can be no virtue in that which is contrary to His divine will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ヒエロニムス・ドロローソはまばたきもせず、ユリエットを凝視した。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の国境を人類の敵の侵入から守ることを使命とする皇帝の使いが、なぜ不浄な{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}を従者にするのかはわかりませんが…悔い改めなさい、{mf|息子|娘}よ。そして皇帝に許しが得られるよう、祈りなさい。あなたの魂は部外者の汚染により、永遠に穢れてしまったのです。皇帝の神聖なる意志に反しては、美徳はありえません！」

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus Dolorosos starrer Blick fixiert Yrliet.{/n} "Ich weiß nicht, warum Seine Stimme, die doch die Grenzen des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} vor dem Eindringen der Feinde der Menschheit schützen soll, es für angebracht hält, eine gottlose {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} in seinem Gefolge zu haben. Ich sage Euch: Bereut, {mf|junger|junge} von Valancius, und betet zum Imperator um Vergebung, denn Eure Seele wurde für immer mit dem Makel einer Fremden befleckt. Es kann keine Tugend in etwas liegen, das Seinem göttlichen Willen widerspricht!"
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus Doloroso's unblinking eyes fix on Yrliet.{/n} "I know not why His voice, vested to protect the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s borders from the intrusions of the enemies of Humanity, would see fit to keep an ungodly {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} in their retinue. But I say to you: repent, young von Valancius, and pray to the Emperor for forgiveness, for your soul has forevermore been stained with the taint of an outsider. There can be no virtue in that which is contrary to His divine will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus Dolorosos starrer Blick fixiert Yrliet.{/n} "Ich weiß nicht, warum Seine Stimme, die doch die Grenzen des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} vor dem Eindringen der Feinde der Menschheit schützen soll, es für angebracht hält, eine gottlose {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} in seinem Gefolge zu haben. Ich sage Euch: Bereut, {mf|mein Sohn|meine Schwester}, und betet zum Imperator um Vergebung, denn Eure Seele wurde für immer mit dem Makel einer Fremden befleckt. Es kann keine Tugend in etwas liegen, das Seinem göttlichen Willen widerspricht!"

languages.text: {n}Le regard fixe de Hiéronymus Doloroso se pose sur Yrliet.{/n} « Je ne sais pas pourquoi Sa voix, chargée de protéger les frontières de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} des intrusions des ennemis de l'humanité, accepterait de garder dans sa suite une {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} impie. Mais je vous le dis : repentez-vous, jeune von Valancius. Implorez l'Empereur de vous accorder Son pardon, car votre âme est souillée par la corruption d'une étrangère. Il ne peut y avoir de vertu dans ce qui s'oppose à Sa volonté divine ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus Doloroso's unblinking eyes fix on Yrliet.{/n} "I know not why His voice, vested to protect the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s borders from the intrusions of the enemies of Humanity, would see fit to keep an ungodly {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} in their retinue. But I say to you: repent, young von Valancius, and pray to the Emperor for forgiveness, for your soul has forevermore been stained with the taint of an outsider. There can be no virtue in that which is contrary to His divine will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard fixe de Hiéronymus Doloroso se pose sur Yrliet.{/n} « Je ne sais pas pourquoi Sa voix, chargée de protéger les frontières de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} des intrusions des ennemis de l'humanité, accepterait de garder dans sa suite une {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} impie. Mais je vous le dis : repentez-vous, {mf|mon fils|ma fille}. Implorez l'Empereur de vous accorder Son pardon, car votre âme est souillée par la corruption d'une étrangère. Il ne peut y avoir de vertu dans ce qui s'oppose à Sa volonté divine ! »

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus Doloroso'nun kırpmadığı gözleri Yrliet'e dikiliyor.{/n} "Yüce efendimizin, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} sınırlarını İnsanlık düşmanlarının işgallerinden korumakla yetkilendirilmiş temsilcisi, tanrı tanımaz bir {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenoyu{/g} maiyetinde neden bulundurur bilmem. Sözlerime kulak ver genç von Valancius: Tövbe et ve İmparator'dan af dile zira ruhun, yabancı bir varlığın kiriyle ebediyen lekelenmiş. O'nun ilahi iradesiyle çelişen eylemlerde fazilet olamaz!"
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus Doloroso's unblinking eyes fix on Yrliet.{/n} "I know not why His voice, vested to protect the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s borders from the intrusions of the enemies of Humanity, would see fit to keep an ungodly {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} in their retinue. But I say to you: repent, young von Valancius, and pray to the Emperor for forgiveness, for your soul has forevermore been stained with the taint of an outsider. There can be no virtue in that which is contrary to His divine will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus Doloroso gözlerini kırpmadan Yrliet'e bakakalıyor.{/n} "O'nun, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un sınırlarını İnsanlığın düşmanlarının müdahalelerinden koruma yetkisine sahip temsilcisi, tanrı tanımaz bir {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g}yu maiyetinde neden bulundurur bilmiyorum ama sözlerime kulak ver genç von Valancius: Tövbe et ve İmparator'dan af dile çünkü ruhun yabancı bir varlığın pisliğiyle sonsuza kadar lekelenmiş. O'nun ilahi iradesiyle çelişen eylemlerde fazilet bulunamaz!"
